website_summaries.verdict: A safer alternative to a standard crib liner. Encourages air flow into the crib and reduces any risk of suffocation, while offering protection from hard slats.
pros: This pack includes 24 vertical padded crib wraps, which are placed around the slats of the crib wall
Unlike conventional crib liners, these encourage airflow to the crib
They go all the way up to the top, providing optimum safety
cons: On the pricey side for crib liners, but they work well

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, best product out there to help protect baby in their crib!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these vertical crib liners!! My little one is quite the mover in his crib when he sleeps. Every time I heard his head smack into the wooden crib rails, I cringed. I didn’t want to use the traditional crib bumpers so I searched online for alternatives and came across these. THESE THINGS ARE AMAZING!! Not only are they made from quality material and provide just enough padding, they look great too! I am so happy I found them! My little one still moves all around his crib, but at least now he’s not smacking his head against wood! Thank you so much for making this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayli

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Thankful for this smart product to keep my baby safe! They are well made, with plenty of padding. The zippers all worked well and seem sturdy. Overall, very happy with my purchase, I just wish I had counted the slats on my crib and bought the bigger pack.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Many zippers don’t work
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy these ... most of the zippers don’t work , I tried multiple times and on many of these the teeth of the zippers don’t line up correctly at the beginning, a few inches down from the top some would work but I’m afraid a baby’s limbs could get trapped in the gap. It did not make a difference if there was any tension on the zipper as when it’s applied to the crib or if the zipper was tested without tension. I’m very disappointed and returning them right away.
customer_reviews.author: C.H

customer_reviews.title: Color does not match
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product, I like the idea that it covers the whole rail and don’t cover the spaces between what sounds safier for me. however it is expensive and you probably will need two packs to cover all rails and like shows on my pic the colors doesn’t match even though I bought two packs of the same item. for the price it cost should be impeccably equal I am so upset about that. It doesn't allow me to publish the pic so I add a video
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: very hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: these look nice, however they are about 1 cm too narrow from our crib. We have flat bars on our crib not round ones. If these were just a tad bit bigger it would have made a HUGE difference. My fingers are straight up raw from pulling the zipper so hard. It said you can zip 2 together, but then they are HUGE. So they look okay, but they are a nightmare to put on. It took my husband and I both working together to get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Q

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! No head bumps, easy to use and clean. Hang dry. Very pretty too!
customer_reviews.author: T. Click

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not enough
customer_reviews.text: They work but only enough to cover half my crib, not sure if it's worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Uta

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for regular crib bumpers!
customer_reviews.text: The regular crib bumpers didn’t fit my daughters crib, so this is a great alternative, and eases my mind about SIDS. Looks great! The only downside is when I washed them, most of the padding came out of the liners and was a pain to put back in.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I can see my baby without having to look inside the crib
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Though it is a little expensive and you'll probably need two packages, it gives me great peace of mind for my mover during the night. If he bumps his head, he is totally fine and his hands and feet have not gotten stuck between the bars. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: kevin barto

customer_reviews.title: Not enough liners in a pack...
customer_reviews.text: These crib liners would have been perfect, but one pack doesn’t have enough for the whole crib! It’s kind of ridiculous to sell a product like this and only have enough for roughly half of the vertical posts in a normal crib, especially for the price. Almost $90 to only cover half of my crib posts? Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

product_meta.title: Pure Safety Vertical Crib Liners in True White Cotton 24 Pack
product_meta.description: Color:True White CottonSafe, simple and stylish - Doctor-approved, Pure Safety Vertical Crib Liners to ensure a better, longer and more comfortable night's sleep. Our liners protect baby's head & body, keep limbs safely inside, and provide optimum air-flow. CSPIA Approved & Certified. Exempt from all crib bumper bans. Cited as safe choice for crib bedding in Journal of Pediatrics. Includes 24 Vertical Liners.
feature_bullets: Doctor Approved - Scientifically tested and proven safer than any other crib bedding option.
Provides 24" of protection and comfort for your baby's head, face and body.
Maintain optimal airflow, critical to reducing CO2 levels within a crib.
Stretch or compress to fit any crib rail.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars16 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
